author: Joshua Hunt
title: Japan Is Racing to Test a Favipiravir, a Drug to Treat Covid-19
description: Based on a compound discovered in 1998, the antiviral Favipiravir is already being used in Japan and Turkey. Its maker? A subsidiary of Fujifilm.
content: In late February, executives at Fujifilms Tokyo headquarters scrambled to coordinate with a team of 100 employees who would be responsible for a task unprecedented in its 86-year history: Japans health minister, Katsunobu Kato, had enlisted the camera and ima… [+3898 chars]
